EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-03-06 AWS vs Azure.ES-20190305-Invite 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Call: AWS vs Azure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, I wanted to make sure you didn't miss out, this is your last call to join more that 1,000 IT professionals for tomorrow's webinar at 11am ET, when Eric Wright, Director of Technical Marketing, will weigh the key differences between AWS and Azure.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]>
During the webinar, AWS vs Azure <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]>, you will hear real anecdotes of how other organizations have chosen between cloud providers and learn how to decide which cloud is right for your environment.
I hope to see you there!
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]> and we will send you the recording afterward.
